title: ondE nAmadalaDgidavO
sahitya:
ondE nAmadalaDagidavO 


anupallavi

  aDagidavO Anandadindudisiruva akhila vEdagaLu


caraNam 1    ondE nAmavu prahlAdanna kAyidu mattontu nAmavu ajAmiLana salahidu 
tande tAyiyu biTTa kanda dharuvarAyagAnandada padavanittAnanda guNavella
    caraNam 2    matsyAnantAvatAra avatAra svacchAdaSTAdasha purANa sAra 
kaccapanAgi mUjagake AdhAra svEcchayindali hari mADO vyApAra
    caraNam 3    opparItake samarilla migililla abbaradali salahuva jagavella 
kabbubillana pita purandara viTTala vaidarbiya ramaNana vara suguNagaLella
